answers.answer: Low body temperature can cause and be caused by some problems. I would double check your thermometer first- are you sure it's accurate? Then make an apt for your dr as soon as you can. I don't know if it's dangerous, but if your body is not regulating normally that could be a sign something is wrong.
Sounds like you may be hypothyroid. This can lower the body temperature.

question: Is it serious if you run a temperture of 96.7 or 97.1 also I have diabetes high blood pressure and asthma
title: Is  this serious
